title: Chloé Dygert Sprints to Stage 3 Tour Down Under Win as Noemi Rüegg Defends for Overall Victory
content:
Attack after attack went off on the stage, but nothing would stick until the final sprint.

Read the full article at Chloé Dygert Sprints to Stage 3 Tour Down Under Win as Noemi Rüegg Defends for Overall Victory on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
